page.title: 14SHOPPING AREA, BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: {Seven Brethren Bank}is a shopping area in Barnstaple just out of the town.{ {UBM,}a builder's merchants and home improvement centre has been there for 14 years,{UBM}sells 80% of its goods to trade, its busiest day of the week is Friday, because that is Barnstaple's market day and many people come to Barnstaple to shop.Its main business though is supplying heavy building items.{UBM}would n't like Sunday trading.{Paul Madelys,}a competitor which does open on a Sunday, contrary to the law, doesn't affect UBM's trade.{Brian Fords,}a superstore,has been on{Seven Brethren {Bank}for 10 yrs.Its business hasn't increased since a special bus started going over there. They sell mostly in bulk.{Brian Fords}don't feel threatened by{Tesco}wanting to build a new hypermarket elsewhere in the town.
